programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o e.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
ga1 init 0
instr 1
aenv expseg .01, p3*0.1, 1, p3*0.9, 0.01 ga1 poscil3 .5*aenv, cpspch(p4), 1 outs ga1,ga1 endin
instr 99
aL, aR reverbsc ga1, ga1, 0.85, 12000, sr, 0.5, 1 outs aL,aR
ga1 = 0
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> f 1 0 128 10 1 ;sine wave
i 1 1 0.1 8.00 i 1 2 0.1 8.02 i 1 3 0.1 8.04 i 1 4 0.1 9.06
i 99 0 6 ;remains active for 6 seconds
e10 </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
